news_header: Target Corp, Home BancShares Inc, and BOK Financial Corp will trade ex-dividend on 2/12/25, with respective dividends of $1.12, $0.195, and $0.57.
news_original_title: Ex-Dividend Reminder: Target, Home BancShares and BOK Financial
news_text: On February 12, 2025, Target Corp (TGT), Home BancShares Inc (HOMB), and BOK Financial Corp (BOKF) will trade ex-dividend for their upcoming dividends. Target Corp will pay a quarterly dividend of $1.12 on March 1, 2025, Home BancShares Inc will pay $0.195 on March 5, 2025, and BOK Financial Corp will pay $0.57 on February 26, 2025. Based on TGT's recent stock price of $131.35, its dividend represents approximately 0.85%, suggesting a potential decrease in share price upon opening. Historical dividend stability is important for assessing future yields, which are estimated at 3.41% for TGT, 2.53% for HOMB, and 2.05% for BOKF.
